text: Jean-Claude Boulard (28 March 1943 â€“ 1 June 2018) was a French politician. He was Mayor of Le Mans from 2001 until his death, Senator from 2014 to 2017, and Deputy from 1988 to 1993 and again from 1997 to 2002. He was born in Nantes, France. Boulard died in Le Mans on 1 June 2018 of a long-illness, aged 75. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1943 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in France Category:French mayors
title: Jean-Claude Boulard
